subtitle: Celery sticks and rice paper create the sails on these pizza 'boats'.

method.text: Make up the pizza base mix as directed on the pack. Roll out on a lightly floured surface to give a 23 cm x 30cm oblong. Transfer onto a baking sheet.
Heat the oil in a frying pan and fry the mushrooms for 3 min or until softened. Mix in the tomatoes, tomato puree, pineapple and ham. Spread over the pizza base.
Sprinkle over the cheese and loosely cover the pizza with oiled cling film. Leave in a warm place for 20-30 min.
Remove the cling film and place in the oven for 25-30 min or until well risen and golden brown.
Allow to cool slightly. Cut the pizza in half lengthways and slice each half into 8 fingers.
Thread the pieces of rice paper onto the celery sticks and fix a sail into the centre of each pizza slice. Serve warm or cold.

title: Pizza boats
